name: Magic Coin
description:
Your objective is to hit only the pieces of your color in 45 seconds. The pieces of your color earn you 3 points, the others make you lose 1. To cross the vertical lines, you must be in the same color.

We are a team of four beginners, two of whom have covid: the weekend was complicated.

Arrows to move

space to jump

X to change color

M to stop/play music

By Emilien BARDE (Developer), Nolann MBINA IVEGA (Graphic designer), Justin ROBERT (Sound designer) and Raphaël DUPPRIEU (Developer)
